title: Add a Joint Owner to an Account
description: A customer wants to add their spouse as a joint owner with rights of survivorship to their checking account.

tasks.description: Explain the legal implications of joint ownership.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains that both owners have equal access and ownership of the funds.

tasks.description: Collect the new owner's personal information and verify their identity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers and verifies the spouse's information.

tasks.description: Update the account titling to reflect the new joint ownership.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the spouse as a joint owner on the account.
